Alias.name: Set Friend
Alias.script:
--syntax: sf name
friend = matches[2] cecho("Friend set to "..friend.."\n")

Alias.name: Tell Friend
Alias.script:
--syntax: tf what
if friend then send("tell "..friend.." "..matches[2]) else cecho("<red>Friend not set!\n") end

Alias.name: Assist Friend
Alias.script:
--syntax: af
if friend then send("assist "..friend) else cecho("<red>Friend not set!\n") end
